external_games.name: Pooh's Party Game: In Search of the Treasure

name: Pooh's Party Game: In Search of the Treasure
summary: Join Winnie the Pooh an exciting adventure in search of lost treasure! Invite your friends to join the fun--play lots of games with each other (and play silly tricks ON each other!). A good time is sure to be had by all--just remember to watch out for Woozles and Heffalumps!
